name: flora flamingo
notes:
flora flamingo is an adorable tropical bird that works up quickly. it is a beginner-friendly doll that can sit on its own, making it a great home decor item for nursery and kids rooms.  this stuffed animal toy is also great as a children’s birthday present or baby shower gift for both boys and girls. other gifting occasions include valentine’s day or the christmas holiday. it is recommended to use super bulky chenille velvet or blanket yarn for a soft, plush look. it can also look great in acrylic or cotton yarns, and can be turned into a smaller size with worsted weight or thinner weights! the pdf pattern includes photo references as well as a link to a video tutorial for the legs. 

**size:**
height: 10 inches (25 cm)

**level:**
★★☆☆☆ beginner/easy. requires familiarity with stitches used (below).

**stitches/terms (us terms):**
fo = fasten off
ch = chain
sl st = slip stitch
sc = single crochet
inc = increase (insert 2 sc in same st)
dec = decrease (sc 2 sts together)
hdc = half double crochet
dc = double crochet

**materials:** 
honey bunny yarn (super bulky “6”) in pink, white, and grey 
5mm crochet hook
12mm plastic safety eyes (x2)
stuffing
scissors
yarn needle
